string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

resources.string: Launchpad Contributions: alexxtasi https://launchpad.net/~alexxtasi tzem https://launchpad.net/~athmakrigiannis
Tomboy εφαρμογή σημειώσεων, συμβατή με wikiwiki.
Copy local note to SD Card on save
Copy all local notes to SD Card
Copy all local notes to SD Card? This may overwrite existing notes on the SD Card.
Choose a file below that is either a Tomboy note file (which will be imported) or a plain text file (which will create a new note):
Αφαιρέστε όλες τις αναζητήσεις που έχουν πραγματοποιηθεί
Clear all notes from local database
Delete all notes from remote service
Are you sure you want to clear the notes database?
Are you sure you want to delete this note?
Are you sure you want to delete all notes from the remote service?
Edit the tags below, separating with commas
Illegal text size chosen. Please choose a number.

A Tomboy client for Android. Tomboy is a desktop note-taking app using a wikiwiki approach and a simple user interface.

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online
* SD Card importation
* Home screen shortcuts
* Send and receive text or note-files from any app
* Open source!
Note-taking app with online synchronization compatible with Tomboy

* Notes can now be created, edited and deleted
* Completely redesigned for both tablets and phones
* Sync your notes with compatible web-services or to your SD card
* Send and receive note files or text from any app
* More configurable than before
* Available in even more languages

 And much more, for a complete list of changes please see https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements
Authorization with %1$s failed. Try again later!
Do you really want to discard your changes and revert the note to the last saved version?
There was an error parsing the note. Please check your XML.
File exceeds maximum import size - are you sure it is plain text?
Η ζητούμενη σημείωση δεν μπορούσε να βρεθεί. Ίσως έχει διαγραφεί ή αφαιρεθεί μέσω συγχρονισμού.
Notes backed up to SD card successfully.
Notes restored from SD card successfully.
Error connecting to %1$s. You probably need to authenticate in "Settings".
Υπήρξε ένα σφάλμα προσπαθώντας να αναλύσει τη συλλογή των σημειώσεων. Εάν είστε σε θέση να αναπαράγετε το πρόβλημα, παρακαλούμε επικοινωνήστε μαζί μας!
Save notes automatically on exiting editor.
If checked, will show deleted notes in notes list.
Συγχρονισμός των σημειώσεων κατά την εκκίνηση
Ο φάκελος \"%1$s\" δεν υπάρχει ακόμα. Παρακαλούμε συνδέστε τη συσκευή σας στον υπολογιστή, δημιουργήστε το φάκελο και γεμίστε το με αρχεία *.note .
Link telephone numbers to phone app
\"%1$s\" δεν είναι έγκυρη η εισαγωγή. Παρακαλώ προσπαθήστε ξανά!
\"%1$s\" δεν είναι έγκυρη τοποθεσία φακέλων. Παρακαλώ προσπαθήστε ξανά!
If checked, will show note templates in notes list.
Η διεύθυνση του εξυπηρετητή άλλαξε, αλλά η νέα τιμή είναι άδεια
Η σύνδεση με τον εξυπηρετητή απέτυχε, παρακαλώ ελέγξτε ότι η διεύθυνση που δώσατε είναι σωστή.
Pull all notes from SD Card? This may overwrite your existing notes.
This will revert a local note to whatever version exist on the remote service. Are you sure you want to do this?
This will revert your local notes to whatever versions exist on the remote service. Are you sure you want to do this?
How would you like to send the note?

Δεν υπάρχουν σημειώσεις στην βάση δεδομένων του Tomdroid.
Please wait while the notes load…
Παρακαλώ περιμένετε όσο φορτώνονται οι σημειώσεις...

Welcome to Tomdroid.

Please note that this is beta quality software and that it contains known problems.

We are well aware of these issues and intend to work on them quickly but I also wanted to get something out and tested as quickly as possible.

If you would like to contribute, help at all levels would be appreciated. Hop on board on launchpad.net/tomdroid and contact us!
The local version was already deleted. Please choose from one of the actions below.
There was a conflict syncing the note \'%1$s\'
The note already exists in the database. Please choose an action to resolve the conflict. You may edit either note before choosing, or view the difference by clicking on the labels below.
Please choose an action to resolve the conflict. You may edit either note before choosing, or view the difference by clicking on the labels below.

A note with that title already exists in the database. Please choose an action to resolve the conflict. You may edit either note before choosing, or view the difference by clicking on the labels below.
Επιλέξτε την υπηρεσία συγχρονισμού για χρήση
